name: Threespot
description:
Threespot is a DC-based independent digital agency hell-bent on helping those who are committed to helping others. Since 1999, we have contributed in meaningful, creative, and—most importantly—effective ways to engage people who give a damn about progress and prosperity for our communities, our country, and our planet.
We work exclusively with social sector, ethical business, and public institution clients to develop long-term, sustainable strategies for building smart communications in service of their missions.
